Item.name: UpperLimit
Item.description: Simplified model fixed at upper limit

Item.name: LowerLimit
Item.description: Simplified model fixed at lower limit

ScalarVariable.name: drive.tau_out
ScalarVariable.description: Torque in flange flange_a and flange_b (tau = flange_a.tau = -flange_b.tau) as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.omega_out
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular velocity of flange_a as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.inductor.v
ScalarVariable.description: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.inductor.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

ScalarVariable.name: der(drive.simpleMotor_EMF.inductor.i)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Current flowing from pin p to pin n)

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.resistor.alpha
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature coefficient of resistance (R_actual = R*(1 + alpha*(T_heatPort - T_ref))

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.resistor.v
ScalarVariable.description: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.resistor.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.resistor.T
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed device temperature if useHeatPort = false

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.resistor.LossPower
ScalarVariable.description: Loss power leaving component via heatPort

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.R_trs
ScalarVariable.description: Effective resistance for transport ac loss

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.hysteresis.alpha
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature coefficient of resistance (R_actual = R*(1 + alpha*(T_heatPort - T_ref))

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.hysteresis.v
ScalarVariable.description: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.hysteresis.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.hysteresis.T
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed device temperature if useHeatPort = false

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.hysteresis.LossPower
ScalarVariable.description: Loss power leaving component via heatPort

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.R_hyst
ScalarVariable.description: Effective resistance for hysteresis ac loss

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.currentSensor.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current in the branch from p to n as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.i1
ScalarVariable.description: Current in the branch from p to n as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.emf1.v
ScalarVariable.description: Voltage drop between the two pins

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.emf1.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing from positive to negative pin

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.emf1.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Angle of shaft flange with respect to support (= flange.phi - support.phi)

ScalarVariable.name: der(drive.simpleMotor_EMF.emf1.phi)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Angle of shaft flange with respect to support (= flange.phi - support.phi))

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.emf1.w
ScalarVariable.description: Angular velocity of flange relative to support

ScalarVariable.name: drive.simpleMotor_EMF.emf1.internalSupport.tau
ScalarVariable.description: External support torque (must be computed via torque balance in model where InternalSupport is used; = flange.tau)

ScalarVariable.name: drive.multiSensorLoad.power
ScalarVariable.description: Power in flange flange_a as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.multiSensorLoad.w
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular velocity of flange_a as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.multiSensorLoad.tau
ScalarVariable.description: Torque in flange flange_a and flange_b (tau = flange_a.tau = -flange_b.tau) as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.data.bidirectional
ScalarVariable.description: Inverter acts like it is controlled by a bidirectional modulation method

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.dutyCycleIn
ScalarVariable.description: Ratio of on-time to period duration

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.coreElement.bidirectional
ScalarVariable.description: Inverter acts like it is controlled by a bidirectional modulation method

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.coreElement.uniOrBidirectional.u1
ScalarVariable.description: Lower boundary of input u, switching from constant value y1 to linear interpolation

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.coreElement.uniOrBidirectional.u2
ScalarVariable.description: Upper boundary of input u, switching from linear interpolation to constant value y2

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.coreElement.uniOrBidirectional.k
ScalarVariable.description: Slope of the resulting line equation

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.coreElement.uniOrBidirectional.y0
ScalarVariable.description: Offset of the resulting line equation

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.coreElement.uniOrBidirectional.gradient.k
ScalarVariable.description: Gain value multiplied with input signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.coreElement.uniOrBidirectional.limiter.strict
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if strict limits with noEvent(..)

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.coreElement.idealBuckConverter.v1
ScalarVariable.description: Voltage drop of port 1 (= p1.v - n1.v)

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.coreElement.idealBuckConverter.v2
ScalarVariable.description: Voltage drop of port 2 (= p2.v - n2.v)

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.coreElement.idealBuckConverter.i1
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing from pos. to neg. pin of port 1

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.coreElement.idealBuckConverter.i2
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing from pos. to neg. pin of port 2

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.currentSensorDC.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current in the branch from p to n as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.currentSensorAC.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current in the branch from p to n as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.averaged.voltageSensorDC.v
ScalarVariable.description: Voltage between pin p and n (= p.v - n.v) as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.dutyCycleIn1
ScalarVariable.description: Ratio of on-time to period duration

ScalarVariable.name: drive.inertia.w
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular velocity of component (= der(phi))

ScalarVariable.name: der(drive.inertia.w)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Absolute angular velocity of component (= der(phi)))

ScalarVariable.name: drive.inertia.a
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular acceleration of component (= der(w))

ScalarVariable.name: drive.potentialSensor.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute voltage potential as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.phi1
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute voltage potential as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.i1
ScalarVariable.description: Current in the branch from p to n as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: drive.batteryPack.v
ScalarVariable.description: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

ScalarVariable.name: drive.batteryPack.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

ScalarVariable.name: tau_out
ScalarVariable.description: Torque in flange flange_a and flange_b (tau = flange_a.tau = -flange_b.tau) as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: omega_out
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular velocity of flange_a as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: phi1
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute voltage potential as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: i1
ScalarVariable.description: Current in the branch from p to n as output signal
